name: Lost Hiker
description:
Looks like you've lost your friend during the hike on this arctic mountain. You have arrived to the last recorded location of your friend's GPS. Explore the environment to look for clues for the whereabouts of your friend.

Lost Hiker is an exploratory game where you, the hiker, is lost on an arctic mountain landscape and looking for clues for your missing friend. Several factors that were considered to make the exploratory experience more interesting and enjoyable were:

  • Sounds of wind
  • Snow falling
  • First person perspective
  • Walking penguins!
  • Missing friend
  • Friend distance indicator
  • Outdoor environment vs. indoor setting

This is a group project by Brittany, Heli, and Yoonjin.
